price: You are only a human being like us, and we think you are nothing but a liar.
arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
